oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Duchy Originals Future Farming Programme – A practical, farmer led approach to innovation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MacMillan, Tom
Pearce, Bruce
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Systems research and participatory research
Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have adapted farmer field schools for the UK to boost innovation in organic and other low-input systems by encouraging farmers to share knowledge about experimentation and supporting farmer priorities for research. Benefits in productivity and for the environment come from improved management practices and the use of renewable resources to provide low cost and sustainable solutions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: MacMillan, Tom and Pearce, Bruce (2014) Duchy Originals Future Farming Programme – A practical, farmer led approach to innovation. IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
